attributes.action: Allow people to oppose petition views
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
To make it law that any petition should give the opertunity to state that you do not agree with the point the petition is for.
This will give a fair view of what peoples concerns really are

rejection.details: Comments on petitions should be sent to team@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
